General.Name: Public Joint-Stock Company Bashinformsvyaz RUB1 PRF'A'(USD)
General.Description: Bashinformsvyaz PAO provides telecommunication services in the Republic of Bashkortostan, Russia. The Company uses microwave technology and fiber-optic connections.  Bashinformsvyaz's subsidiary Bashtelecom, provides GSM-900 standard cellular telephone services.
